/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in the area. In the distance, a large blue wall stands out against the greenery, adorned with colorful advertisements that add vibrancy to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, completing the picturesque view of this worldwide landmark.
